data.message: Hey Facebook. Your last couple updates have ruined the experience of using the app. Videos cut out every 3 seconds. Errors happen almost every time I go to share something. Gifs pop up blank of with an error image. And uploads to fb messager fail to send all together. An update comes out every week and the apps just get worse.

replies.message: Sorry to hear that, Justin. We're constantly working to improve our community's experience with our products. If you have any suggestions you'd like to share, please visit: http://bit.ly/2A15yCd. -Mollie
